response.original_title: Dave Chappelle: The Kennedy Center Mark Twain Prize for American Humor
response.overview: In 2019 comedy great Dave Chappelle received the 22nd Annual Mark Twain Prize for American Humor. The event was held in a ceremony at the Kennedy Center in Washington, DC. Toasting Chappelle were a who's who of the entertainment industry.
response.title: Dave Chappelle: The Kennedy Center Mark Twain Prize for American Humor
